plot: A weekly series where each week, thanks to their magic, a known personality has the chance to be transported into the world of his choice with the masters of special effects in Québec, Les Satiriques.
plot_en: A weekly series where each week, thanks to their magic, a known personality has the chance to be transported into the world of his choice with the masters of special effects in Québec, Les Satiriques.
plot_es: A weekly series where each week, thanks to their magic, a known personality has the chance to be transported into the world of his choice with the masters of special effects in Québec, Les Satiriques.
title: Les gars des vues
